name: Shady Goat | A FullStack Dev
description: Heya! I'm Shady Goat, a fullstack developer. I mainly do backend development, but I'm not bad at frontend. I know typescript, javascript, python, and learning golang. I do SQL, SQLite, noSQL (MongoDB). I know express, fastify for backend in node.js. I also do discord bots, using either python or node.js.
